FuncDef:
The display evpn mac-duplication command displays information about MAC duplication suppression in all EVPN instances.
The display evpn mac-duplication statistics command displays statistics about MAC duplication suppression of all EVIs. The display evpn mac-duplication command displays information about MAC duplication suppression in all EVPN instances. The display evpn mac-duplication statistics command displays statistics about MAC duplication suppression of all EVIs. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Enables the function to collect statistics about MAC address suppression of all EVPN instances.
-
